relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named in Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SSE for 2nd consecutive year
relatedBlades.subtitle: We cite our single-vendor SASE platform that modernizes your network
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report for its ability to execute and completeness of vision. Cloudflare is one of only 10 vendors recognized in the report. __We believe this recognition represents the largest year-over-year momentum in the SSE market.__ We cite it as a testament to Cloudflare's connectivity cloud and its ability to consolidate more use cases onto our unified platform and simplify our customers' architectures across applications, network, and cybersecurity. Cloudflare modernizes infrastructure, removes point solutions, and integrates IT domains onto a unified intelligent platform of programmable cloud-native services, all managed through a simplified interface without security or performance tradeoffs.

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Gartner, "Magic Quadrant for Security Service Edge", Analyst(s): Charlie Winckless, Thomas Lintemuth, Dale Koeppen, April 15, 2024
